title: 2024/2025 UTME Registration Commences
summary: JAMB announces the commencement of registration for the 2024/2025 Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME). Registration period runs from January 15 to February 26, 2024.

title: JAMB Mock Examination Date Announced
summary: The Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board has scheduled the mock examination for March 7, 2024. Candidates are advised to print their mock examination slips from the JAMB portal.

title: 2024 UTME Main Examination Date
summary: The main UTME examination is scheduled to hold from April 19 to April 29, 2024. Candidates should check their examination centers and print their examination slips.

title: JAMB Result Release Date
summary: JAMB announces that results for the 2024 UTME will be released starting from May 2, 2024. Candidates can check their results on the JAMB portal using their registration number.

title: Post-UTME Registration Guidelines
summary: Guidelines for Post-UTME screening exercises have been released. Universities will commence their screening exercises from May 15, 2024. Candidates are advised to check individual university websites for specific requirements.

title: JAMB CAPS Portal Opens for Admission
summary: The Central Admission Processing System (CAPS) portal is now open for candidates to accept or reject admission offers. First choice admission offers will be available from June 1, 2024.

title: JAMB Change of Course/Institution Window Opens
summary: The window for change of course and institution is now open from July 10 to August 10, 2024. Candidates can make changes to their course or institution choices for a fee.

title: JAMB Direct Entry Registration
summary: Registration for Direct Entry (DE) candidates commences on February 20, 2024. DE candidates must have A'Level results, OND, HND, or first degree to be eligible.

title: JAMB Announces New CBT Centers
summary: JAMB has accredited new Computer-Based Test (CBT) centers across Nigeria to accommodate the increasing number of candidates. The list of approved centers is available on the JAMB website.

title: JAMB Registration Fee and Payment Methods
summary: The registration fee for 2024 UTME is N4,700. Payment can be made through banks, online platforms, or USSD codes. Candidates are advised to use only approved payment channels.

title: JAMB Announces New Syllabus for 2024
summary: JAMB has released an updated syllabus for the 2024 UTME. Candidates are advised to download the new syllabus from the JAMB website to prepare adequately for the examination.

title: JAMB Warns Against Fraudulent Activities
summary: JAMB warns candidates against falling victim to fraudsters promising to help with registration or result upgrades. All transactions must be done through official JAMB channels only.

title: JAMB Announces Special Consideration for PWDs
summary: JAMB has announced special considerations for Persons With Disabilities (PWDs) including extended time, special centers, and assistive devices. PWDs should register early to access these facilities.

title: JAMB Registration Requirements
summary: Candidates must have a valid email address, National Identification Number (NIN), passport photograph, and O'Level results to register. Biometric verification is mandatory at accredited centers.

title: JAMB Announces Date for Supplementary UTME
summary: Supplementary UTME examination for candidates who missed the main examination will hold on May 15, 2024. Affected candidates will be notified via SMS and email.
